page.title: 10Golspie-A School Day.
page.content: At 6.45am I wake up but I'm not allowed up till 7.30.I dress,wash, clean my teeth and have breakfast with mam and dad.When finished I feed my banties(small hens) and take my dog for a walk.At 8.20am my friend calls and we go to school.At 9.am.the school bell goes and we line up,are taken in,and we enter the classroom.We start the day with the Lord's Prayer,do some mental mathematics followed by our mathematical text book.Then it is playtime.I play football mostly.I was wondering if I would be playing the computer or drawing.I like using felt- tipped pens instead of paints.We got English instead!After lunch in the afternoon we do our project work and sometimes we read a book or a poem.At 3.40pm we leave school.I play football and do my homework and then get called for my tea.I might watch some T.V.
